author: James Martin
method: Preheat the grill to high Tip all the crust ingredients into a processor and blitz briefly.  Cook the lamb cutlets under the grill and serve scattered with the herb crust.
ingredients: 4 lamb cutlets,  1 slice of bread, toasted,  handful of fresh mixed herbs (parsley, mint, basil),  80g/3oz parmesan, finely grated,  salt and pepper to taste
